title: Major (Honours Program)
footnotes: CIS*2750 Software Systems Development and  Integration recommended for students interested in the software area of interest.

title: Restricted Electives
desc: The Engineering Program requires Computer Engineering students to complete the following combination of elective credits to complete their program:

Consult the Program Guide for further information on the prerequisite requirements specific to each elective. Students can take a maximum of 1.50 credits at the 1000 level from the above list of electives.
lists:
2.00 credits from the CENG-1 Computer Engineering electives
	2.00 credits from Complementary Studies electives
